history.narrative: Law 5-155 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 5-322, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 7, 1984 and December 4, 1984, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 10, 1984, it was assigned Act No. 5-220 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
